verses.roman:
vṛndāvana-dāsa-pade koṭi namaskāra
aiche grantha kari' teṅho tārilā saṁsāra

synonyms: vṛndāvana-dāsa-pade—unto the lotus feet of Śrīla Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura; koṭi—millions; namaskāra—obeisances; aiche—such; grantha—book; kari'-compiling; teṅho—he; tarilā—delivered; saṁsāra—all the world.
translation: I offer millions of obeisances unto the lotus feet of Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura. No one else could write such a wonderful book for the deliverance of all fallen souls.
